name: Lead Full-stack (.Net+Angular) Software Engineer
description:
We are looking for Lead full-stack (.Net + Angular) Software Engineer who will be able to take responsibility and drive the team to the next level. We are working closely with our UK client to deliver a solution to revolutionized the way market assessments performed and improving the client decision making process, through a portal that allowed clients to undertake research and analytics themselves. Ultimately, the portal supports Clients that used it right the way through the investment journey from research through to helping assess operational return.

Requirements:

  • 5+ years of commercial experience;
  • Experience with C# (9+);
  • ASP.NET Core (6+): OData, IdentityServer (JWT); CQRS + MediatR;
  • Databases: PostgreSQL (Basic syntax/SQL queries); MSSQL (Basic syntax/SQL queries);
  • RDBMS Explorer: PgAdmin, MSSQL Management Tools or IDE Integrated Database Explorer;
  • Unit testing: XUnit; Shouldly; AutoMoq;
  • CI/CD: Azure DevOps (Code Review); AWS (S3 – SDK);
  • Reporting: Razor Engine;
  • ORM: Entity Framework Core (6+);
  • TypeScript: Utility types, JavaScript (ES6+):
  • Styling: SASS, CSS Frameworks (Bootstrap);
  • Angular (11+): RxJS (basic operators); Karma + Jasmine;
  • Front-end tools: Chrome DevTools;
  • Linters: eslint;
  • English level: B2.

Nice to have:

  • Databases: MSSQL (Change Data Capture);
  • Scheduled tasks: Quartz.NET
  • ASP.NET: IdentityServer (ASP.NET Identity - OAuth/OpenID Connect);
  • Caching: In-memory, ResponseCache;
  • CI/CD: Azure DevOps (Build Pipelines); AWS (EC2, VPC, RDS);
  • Reporting: EPPlus, SpireXLS, wkhtmltopdf;
  • ORM: Dapper;
  • Styling: PostCSS; CSS framework (Angular Flex Layout);
  • Angular (11+): State management (NgXS);
  • Front-end tools: Figma;
  • Linters: stylehinnt, htmlhint.

We can offer:

  • Projects for such clients as PayPal, Wargaming, Xerox, Philips, adidas and Toyota
  • Competitive compensation that depends on your qualification and skills
  • Career development system with clear skill qualifications
  • Flexible working hours aligned to your schedule
  • Options to work remotely
  • Corporate medical insurance covering services of private and public medical centers
  • English courses online
  • Corporate parties and events for employees and their children
  • Gym membership compensation, corporate sport competitions (cybersport included)
  • 5 days of paid sick leave per year with no obligation to submit a sick-leave certificate
